# Discovering OpenSees -- Who Needs a GUI

Title: How to Build a Model of a Structure Faster with a Script than with a GUI

Register for the seminar:

  • June 12, at 10:00 am Pacific Time registration: 1
  • June 12, at 4:30 pm Pacific Time registration: 2

This seminar will demonstrate how scripts can be used to generate building models faster and with less error than can be built using your typical graphical user interface. Example Buildings will include a moment frame and a braced frame.
